column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I want to give a shout out to our "regular" server
column4: and simply super!!! I love this Lou Malnati's location. The service is great
column6: and the pizza TRUMPS EVERY OTHER CHICAGO STYLE PIZZA THERE IS OUT THERE! My boyfriend and I have been eating here for 2 years and will keep eating here! Keep up the great work guys!! Long live the pepperoni deep dish pizza from Lou's!
